trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFGLASSESEXCHANGE_00850_TALK_000_000<tab>Greetings. I'm conducting a recall of spectacles formerly classified as headgear. I shall be happy to exchange any such items in your possession for a new, more convenient model.
TEXT_CMNDEFGLASSESEXCHANGE_00850_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Spectacles registered as fashion accessories will be exchanged for the equivalent facewear item.
TEXT_CMNDEFGLASSESEXCHANGE_00850_TALK_000_002<tab>Ah. It would seem you don't have any spectacles of the sort I'm recalling. If you happen to obtain a pair, please do bring them to me.
TEXT_CMNDEFGLASSESEXCHANGE_00850_TALK_000_003<tab>Ah. It would seem you have already exchanged all your spectacles. Thank you for your cooperation.
